title: 3 snaps from Cassie’s elegant baby shower
text:
Cape Town - Cassie is a mom-to-be and she’s celebrating in style.

The singer, who recently got married to personal trainer Alex Fine, celebrated her baby shower over the weekend with close friends and family including model Karreuche Tran.

Taking to her Instagram page, she shared pictures from the celebration which was themed “baby fine girls’ night”.

The 33-year-old actress announced her pregnancy in August by posting a picture of herself with her cute baby bump with the caption “Birthday suit”.

READ MORE: Cassie shows off her growing baby bump in a gorgeous nude shoot

The mom-to-be, who is pregnant with her first child, was dressed in all-black.

(Swipe right more)
description: Cassie is a mom-to-be and she’s celebrating in style.
